import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../App.css"; class Home extends Component { render() { const itemList = this.props.state.tagVisible === "all" ? this.props.state.items.map((item) => { return (

{/* {item.name} (${prices[item.name]}) */}



); }) : this.props.state.items .filter((item) => item.tag === this.props.state.tagVisible) .map((item) => { return (

{/* {item.name} (${prices[item.name]}) */}



); }); return (
{itemList}
); } } export default Home;
